 17 /**
 18  * Creates a new VR cube face.
 19  *
 20  * @class a VR cube face. The {@link bigshot.VRPanorama} instance holds
 21  * six of these.
 22  *
 23  * @param {bigshot.VRPanorama} owner the VR panorama this face is part of.
 24  * @param {String} key the identifier for the face. "f" is front, "b" is back, "u" is
 25  * up, "d" is down, "l" is left and "r" is right.
 26  * @param {bigshot.Point3D} topLeft_ the top-left corner of the quad.
 27  * @param {number} width_ the length of the sides of the face, expressed in multiples of u and v.
 28  * @param {bigshot.Point3D} u basis vector going from the top left corner along the top edge of the face
 29  * @param {bigshot.Point3D} v basis vector going from the top left corner along the left edge of the face
 30  */
 31 bigshot.VRFace = function (owner, key, topLeft_, width_, u, v, onLoaded) {
 32     var that = this;
 33     this.owner = owner;
 34     this.key = key;
 35     this.topLeft = topLeft_;
 36     this.width = width_;
 37     this.u = u;
 38     this.v = v;
 39     this.updated = false;
 40     this.parameters = new Object ();
 41     
 42     for (var k in this.owner.getParameters ()) {
 43         this.parameters[k] = this.owner.getParameters ()[k];
 44     }
 45     
 46     bigshot.setupFileSystem (this.parameters);
 47     this.parameters.fileSystem.setPrefix ("face_" + key);
 48     this.parameters.merge (this.parameters.fileSystem.getDescriptor (), false);
 49     
 50     
 51     /**
 52      * Texture cache.
 53      *
 54      * @private
 55      */
 56     this.tileCache = owner.renderer.createTileCache (function () { 
 57             that.updated = true;
 58             owner.renderUpdated (bigshot.VRPanorama.ONRENDER_TEXTURE_UPDATE);
 59         }, onLoaded, this.parameters);
 60     
 61     this.fullSize = this.parameters.width;
 62     this.overlap = this.parameters.overlap;
 63     this.tileSize = this.parameters.tileSize;
 64     
 65     this.minDivisions = 0;
 66     var fullZoom = Math.log (this.fullSize - this.overlap) / Math.LN2;
 67     var singleTile = Math.log (this.tileSize - this.overlap) / Math.LN2;
 68     this.maxDivisions = Math.floor (fullZoom - singleTile);
 69     this.maxTesselation = this.parameters.maxTesselation >= 0 ? this.parameters.maxTesselation : this.maxDivisions;
 70 }
 71 
 72 bigshot.VRFace.prototype = {
 73     browser : new bigshot.Browser (),
 74     
 75     dispose : function () {
 76         this.tileCache.dispose ();
 77     },
 78     
 79     /**
 80      * Utility function to do a multiply-and-add of a 3d point.
 81      *
 82      * @private
 83      * @param p {bigshot.Point3D} the point to multiply
 84      * @param m {number} the number to multiply the elements of p with
 85      * @param a {bigshot.Point3D} the point to add
 86      * @return p * m + a
 87      */
 88     pt3dMultAdd : function (p, m, a) {
 89         return {
 90             x : p.x * m + a.x,
 91             y : p.y * m + a.y,
 92             z : p.z * m + a.z
 93         };
 94     },
 95     
 96     /**
 97      * Utility function to do an element-wise multiply of a 3d point.
 98      *
 99      * @private
100      * @param p {bigshot.Point3D} the point to multiply
101      * @param m {number} the number to multiply the elements of p with
102      * @return p * m
103      */
104     pt3dMult : function (p, m) {
105         return {
106             x : p.x * m,
107             y : p.y * m,
108             z : p.z * m
109         };
110     },
111     
112     /**
113      * Creates a textured quad.
114      *
115      * @private
116      */
117     generateFace : function (scene, topLeft, width, tx, ty, divisions) {
118         width *= this.tileSize / (this.tileSize - this.overlap);
119         var texture = this.tileCache.getTexture (tx, ty, -this.maxDivisions + divisions);
120         scene.addQuad (this.owner.renderer.createTexturedQuad (
121                 topLeft,
122                 this.pt3dMult (this.u, width),
123                 this.pt3dMult (this.v, width),
124                 texture
125             )
126         );
127     },
128     
129     VISIBLE_NONE : 0,
130     VISIBLE_SOME : 1,
131     VISIBLE_ALL : 2,
132     
133     /**
134      * Tests whether the point is in the axis-aligned rectangle.
135      * 
136      * @private
137      * @param point the point
138      * @param min top left corner of the rectangle
139      * @param max bottom right corner of the rectangle
140      */
141     pointInRect : function (point, min, max) {
142         return (point.x >= min.x && point.y >= min.y && point.x < max.x && point.y < max.y);
143     },
144     
145     /**
146      * Intersects a quadrilateral with the view frustum.
147      * The test is a simple rectangle intersection of the AABB of
148      * the transformed quad with the viewport.
149      *
150      * @private
151      * @return VISIBLE_NONE, VISIBLE_SOME or VISIBLE_ALL
152      */
153     intersectWithView : function intersectWithView (transformed) {
154         var numNull = 0;
155         var tf = [];
156         var tfl = transformed.length;
157         for (var i = 0; i < tfl; ++i) {
158             if (transformed[i] == null) {
159                 numNull++;
160             } else {
161                 tf.push (transformed[i]);
162             }
163         }
164         if (numNull == 4) {
165             return this.VISIBLE_NONE;
166         }
167         
168         var minX = tf[0].x;
169         var minY = tf[0].y;
170         
171         var maxX = minX;
172         var maxY = minY;
173         
174         var viewMinX = 0;
175         var viewMinY = 0;
176         
177         var viewMaxX = this.viewportWidth;
178         var viewMaxY = this.viewportHeight;
179         
180         var pointsInViewport = 0;
181         var tl = tf.length;
182         for (var i = 1; i < tl; ++i) {
183             var tix = tf[i].x;
184             var tiy = tf[i].y;
185             
186             minX = minX < tix ? minX : tix;
187             minY = minY < tiy ? minY : tiy;
188             
189             
190             maxX = maxX > tix ? maxX : tix;
191             maxY = maxY > tiy ? maxY : tiy;
192         }
193         
194         var iminX = minX > viewMinX ? minX : viewMinX;
195         var iminY = minY > viewMinY ? minY : viewMinY;
196         
197         var imaxX = maxX < viewMaxX ? maxX : viewMaxX;
198         var imaxY = maxY < viewMaxY ? maxY : viewMaxY;
199         
200         if (iminX <= imaxX && iminY <= imaxY) {
201             return this.VISIBLE_SOME;
202         }            
203         
204         return this.VISIBLE_NONE;
205     },
206     
207     /**
208      * Quick and dirty computation of the on-screen distance in pixels
209      * between two 2d points. We use the max of the x and y differences.
210      * In case a point is null (that is, it's not on the screen), we 
211      * return an arbitrarily high number.
212      *
213      * @private
214      */
215     screenDistance : function screenDistance (p0, p1) {
216         if (p0 == null || p1 == null) {
217             return 0;
218         }
219         return Math.max (Math.abs (p0.x - p1.x), Math.abs (p0.y - p1.y));
220     },
221     
222     transformToScreen : function transformToScreen (v) {
223         return this.owner.renderer.transformToScreen (v);
224     },
225     
226     /**
227      * Optionally subdivides a quad into fourn new quads, depending on the
228      * position and on-screen size of the quad.
229      *
230      * @private
231      * @param {bigshot.WebGLTexturedQuadScene} scene the scene to add quads to
232      * @param {bigshot.Point3D} topLeft the top left corner of this quad
233      * @param {number} width the sides of the quad, expressed in multiples of u and v
234      * @param {int} divisions the current number of divisions done (increases by one for each
235      * split-in-four).
236      * @param {int} tx the tile column this face is in
237      * @param {int} ty the tile row this face is in 
238      */
239     generateSubdivisionFace : function generateSubdivisionFace (scene, topLeft, width, divisions, tx, ty, transformed) {
240         if (!transformed) {
241             transformed = new Array (4);
242             transformed[0] = this.transformToScreen (topLeft);
243             var topRight = this.pt3dMultAdd (this.u, width, topLeft);
244             transformed[1] = this.transformToScreen (topRight);
245             
246             var bottomLeft = this.pt3dMultAdd (this.v, width, topLeft);
247             transformed[3] = this.transformToScreen (bottomLeft);
248             
249             var bottomRight = this.pt3dMultAdd (this.v, width, topRight);
250             transformed[2] = this.transformToScreen (bottomRight);            
251         };
252         
253         var numVisible = this.intersectWithView (transformed);
254         
255         if (numVisible == this.VISIBLE_NONE) {
256             return;
257         }
258         
259         var dmax = 0;
260         for (var i = 0; i < transformed.length; ++i) {
261             var next = (i + 1) % 4;
262             dmax = Math.max (this.screenDistance (transformed[i], transformed[next]), dmax);
263         }
264         
265         // Convert the distance to physical pixels
266         dmax *= this.owner.browser.getDevicePixelScale ();
267         
268         if (divisions < this.minDivisions 
269                 || 
270                 (
271                     (
272                         dmax > this.owner.maxTextureMagnification * (this.tileSize - this.overlap) 
273                     ) && divisions < this.maxDivisions && divisions < this.maxTesselation
274                 )
275             ) {
276                 var center = this.pt3dMultAdd ({x: this.u.x + this.v.x, y: this.u.y + this.v.y, z: this.u.z + this.v.z }, width / 2, topLeft);
277                 var midTop = this.pt3dMultAdd (this.u, width / 2, topLeft);
278                 var midLeft = this.pt3dMultAdd (this.v, width / 2, topLeft);
279                 
280                 var tCenter = this.transformToScreen (center);
281                 var tMidLeft = this.transformToScreen (midLeft);
282                 var tMidTop = this.transformToScreen (midTop);
283                 var tMidRight = this.transformToScreen (this.pt3dMultAdd (this.u, width, midLeft));
284                 var tMidBottom = this.transformToScreen (this.pt3dMultAdd (this.v, width, midTop));
285                 
286                 this.generateSubdivisionFace (scene, topLeft, width / 2, divisions + 1, tx * 2, ty * 2, [transformed[0], tMidTop, tCenter, tMidLeft]);
287                 this.generateSubdivisionFace (scene, midTop, width / 2, divisions + 1, tx * 2 + 1, ty * 2, [tMidTop, transformed[1], tMidRight, tCenter]);
288                 this.generateSubdivisionFace (scene, midLeft, width / 2, divisions + 1, tx * 2, ty * 2 + 1, [tMidLeft, tCenter, tMidBottom, transformed[3]]);
289                 this.generateSubdivisionFace (scene, center, width / 2, divisions + 1, tx * 2 + 1, ty * 2 + 1, [tCenter, tMidRight, transformed[2], tMidBottom]);
290             } else {
291                 this.generateFace (scene, topLeft, width, tx, ty, divisions);
292             }
293     },
294     
295     /**
296      * Tests if the face has had any updated texture
297      * notifications from the tile cache.
298      *
299      * @public
300      */
301     isUpdated : function () {
302         return this.updated;
303     },
304     
305     /**
306      * Renders this face into a scene.
307      * 
308      * @public
309      * @param {bigshot.WebGLTexturedQuadScene} scene the scene to render into
310      */
311     render : function (scene) {
312         this.updated = false;
313         this.viewportWidth = this.owner.renderer.getViewportWidth ();
314         this.viewportHeight = this.owner.renderer.getViewportHeight ();        
315         this.generateSubdivisionFace (scene, this.topLeft, this.width, 0, 0, 0);
316     },
317     
318     /**
319      * Performs post-render cleanup.
320      */
321     endRender : function () {
322         this.tileCache.purge ();
323     }
324 }
325
